Org_Studio_Assign_Roles_Configuration_Da.description: Allows you to manage and update Is Leader roles that are enabled for Supervisory Organizations based on the Maintain Assignable Roles task.

Assignable_RoleObject.description: Display information used to describe an instance of an object. This 'optional' information is for outbound descriptive purposes only and is not processed on inbound Workday Web Services requests.

Assignable_RoleObjectID.description: The unique identifier type. Each "ID" for an instance of an object contains a type and a value. A single instance of an object can have multiple "ID" but only a single "ID" per "type".  Some "types" require a reference to a parent instance.

Assignable_RoleObject.description: Contains a unique identifier for an instance of an object.

Org_Studio_Assign_Roles_Configuration_Da.description: Configure which assignable roles you would like to make available in Org Studio.

validation.validation: Remove the following invalid role(s): [roles]. Only non Self-Assigned roles enabled for Supervisory Organization are allowed.

Org_Studio_Configuration_Data.description: Contains Org Studio Configuration Data for Assign Roles.  Default option includes all leadership roles while the Allowed Assignable Role Reference field overrides this behavior by specifying which Assignable Roles should be allowed. The two fields are mutually exclusive.

description: Contains data for updating Org Studio Configuration
